channel.title: Migration on Ruddra
channel.description: Recent content in Migration on Ruddra

item.title: Django: Changing User Model in Mid-Project
item.description: Every now and then I see some questions pop up in StackOverflow with title: ValueError: Related model ‘app.User’ cannot be resolved This is a very common issue and pops up when the user tries to run the migration. So, lets talk more about what is this problem and how can we solve it.
